distribution.description:
Enjoy reading or listening to the Bible in one year on your iPhone or Android device.

- [Download for iOS from the App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/bible-in-one-year/id504133402?mt=8)
- [Download for Android on Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.multipie.bibleinoneyear&hl=en_GB)
Receive a daily email with a fresh devotion straight in your inbox.

cta.code: Sign up now

distribution.description:
BiOY Youth is avalible as a podcast. Listen along to the Bible in One Year with introductions from Toby Stokes, passages read by David Suchet, and Nicky & Pippa reading each day’s commentary.
Listen now on:

- [Apple Podcast](https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/youth-bioy/id1493330473)
- [Spotify](https://open.spotify.com/show/64lLuiXmbTV66AyW0hTQ38?si=XI_-e3gHS-eaDJT42okbBg)

Or wherever you listen
Far from your mobile device? You can read the daily devotion right here on this website.

Nicky Gumbel, pioneer of Alpha - a series of sessions exploring the Christian faith - and vicar of Holy Trinity Brompton in Kensington, London, aids readers following the Bible in one year programme to understand the Scriptures better.

- [Buy from Eden.co.uk](https://www.eden.co.uk/the-bible-in-one-year-a-commentary-nicky-gumbel/)
- [Buy from Amazon.co.uk](https://www.amazon.co.uk/Bible-One-Year-Commentary-Gumbel/dp/1473677068/)

Enjoy reading or listening to the Bible in one year on your iPhone or Android device.

- [Download for iOS from the App Store](https://itunes.apple.com/gb/app/bible-in-one-year/id504133402?mt=8)
- [Download for Android on Google Play](https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.multipie.bibleinoneyear&hl=en_GB)
Receive a daily email with a fresh devotion straight in your inbox.
